title: Did United States taxpayers pay more than $90 billion under the Trump Tax Act?
subtitle: The IRS raised another $93 billion from taxpayers in FY2018 over 2017, but that doesn't mean it's a warning of things coming.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: In 2018, United States taxpayers paid more than $90 billion under the Trump Administration Tax Act than they had paid the previous year.
